issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. In Kitchen Sink navigate to Mashups
2. Click any of the table rows

Actual result:
The following output is shown in the console:
SCRIPT5007: Unable to get value of the property 'addEventListener': object is null or undefined 

or

SCRIPT5007: Unable to get value of the property 'open': object is null or undefined

Exptected result:
One is able to click the rows of the mashup tab
fields.summary: MobileWeb : Mashups - Internet Explorer: In Kitchen Sink > Mashups IE prints errors to the console and doesn't load the respective tabs
fields.environment:
Tested with Ti Studio build 1.0.8.201201262211
Ti Mob SDK 1.9.0.v20120209110134
Windows 7
Internet Explorer 9

comments.body: Marking this one as invalid because A) the mashups require a proxy in order to work on mobile web and B) the mashups are disabled on the new KitchenSink.
